## RequestManager.eth\_getUncleCountByBlockHash property

Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block hash.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eth_getUncleCountByBlockHash: (blockHash: TxHash) => Promise<number>;
```
